resources.string:
"Welcome to Gaming Hub.Enjoy surfing and shoping of Various games,but before doing so please follow certain instructions mentioned below:

 1. Surfing and viewing games and game content is totally free.
 2. If you want to purchase any game from our app, then you need to login first and follow simple steps.
 3. You can also view tour purchase list by loging in to our app in My purchases option through navigation drawer.
 4. Login details and password are safe with us at our server database. 
 5. Whatever password you select please remember or save it at safe place and use it afterwards, because we are working on "foget password function".
 6. If you are uploading any game, then we'll also be checking on your company's existance and reputaion. So, no unauthorized user can upload contant to our app server."
